snippet.title: Citadelum - Official Developer Commentary: Gameplay Overview Video
snippet.description:
Join the development team at Abylight Barcelona for a deep dive into the gameplay of Citadelum in this latest video for the upcoming city builder game set in legendary Ancient Rome. The video showcases some of the features of Citadelum, including the strategy system, battle system, Gods' interactions, and more. We get to see the building mechanics, the map, and much more. Citadelum will be available on PC in October 2024.

In Citadelum, build your own settlement, gather resources and evolve it into a magnificent city. Explore the world, trade and lead your mighty legions in epic tactical battles. Earn the favor of the Gods or challenge them, if you dare.
